Julian is very thankful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help brought to him he will be able to buy a large amount of grocery items like rice, sugar, beans, snacks, breads and others. In this way he will have a better stocked business and be able to attend to more customers. Julian will continue working and making the effort to achieve his great dream of expanding his business and becoming a great business owner.

loans.use: to buy goods.

loans.name: Blanca Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora Blanca es una socia que desde hace 9 años forma parte de la banca comunal Unión Progresista, este tipo de créditos le gusta porque en cada reunión se encuentra con sus amigas y pueden ayudarse en sus problemas, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar que cuenta con hermosos paisajes gracias a su geografía accidentada, su gente se dedica al comercio, crianza de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad. 

Doña Blanca tiene 47 años, es casada y ha concebido 3 hijos quienes son mayores de edad, dos de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hija soltera trabaja y ayuda  económicamente. La casa en la que vive es propia. Su esposo labora prestando sus servicios como guardia.

La señora. Blanca labora diariamente en la limpieza de casas actividad que la desempeña desde hace algún tiempo atrás. En su casa se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pollos, también cultiva sus tierras y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar.

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, pollos y alimento para animales.

Su meta es tener un criadero más grande de animales.
texts.en: Blanca has been a member of the Union Progesista community bank for the past nine years, and she enjoys the format because at every meeting she sees her friends and they help each other with their problems. She lives in the parish of Santa Ana in Cuenca, Ecuador, which is known for its beautiful views. The people make a living in commerce, livestock and farming, and many work in the city. Blanca is 47 years old, married and has three children who are grown up; two are married and live on their own, and her single daughter works and helps out with the household finances. Blanca owns her home. Her husband works as a security guard, while Blanca has cleaned houses for a number of years. At home, she dedicates herself to raising pigs and chickens while also raising crops on her land to feed the household. She plans to use this loan to purchase pigs, chickens and animal feed. Her goal is to have a larger area for her animals.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Estefany

texts.es:
Estefany es una mujer de 22 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su pareja y su pequeño hijo de tres años, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; gracias a su esfuerzo Estefany se encuentra estudiando pequeños cursos de repostería, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar deliciosos dulces y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Estefany trabaja como obrera de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Estefany se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción y plásticos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para hacer refacciones en el techo y patio de su vivienda, ya que este actualmente es de caña y esteras y no brinda mucha seguridad, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una gran repostera y tener su casa construida con materiales adecuados.
texts.en:
Estefany, 22, lives in the city of Cañete, in the Imperial district, with her partner and her young son, 3, whom she loves and who is her main motivation in life.  She's a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who, with her husband, puts all her effort into getting her family ahead.  Thanks to her effort, Estefany is taking short courses in pastry-making.  In her free time she likes to cook delicious sweets and sometimes she makes a delicious Carapulcra con Sopa Seca [pork with noodles] to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with a lot of effort and enthusiasm, Estefany works as a farmworker on a farm in her city.  She works every day from early in the morning and can do it for approximately eight hours.  She's comfortable doing her job and believes it's going well for her because of her good performance and her friendly treatment of others.

Estefany's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy construction materials and plastics, which will help her make repairs on the roof and the patio of her house.  Currently it's made of reeds and rush, and doesn't offer much security.

She'll be able to continue working and making the effort to achieve her big dream of being a great pastry chef and having her own house built of appropriate materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Lourdes Esperanza

texts.es:
La Señora. Lourdes es una socia que se encuentra realizando el tercer crédito en el banco comunal Unión Progresista, es una mujer muy joven, alegre y con todas las ganas de salir en adelante, vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar que cuenta con hermosos paisajes gracias a su geografía accidentada, su gente se dedica al comercio, crianza de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad.
 
La Señora. Lourdes es madre soltera de una niña de 3 años de edad, aun no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Lourdes trabaja como empleada domestica de lunes a viernes todo el día, en su casa se dedica a la cría y venta de pollos, estas actividades le permiten mejorar su situación económica.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para crecer más en esta actividad.
 
Su sueño es tener un restaurante.
texts.en:
Lourdes is a member who is getting her third loan in Unión Progresista Communal Bank.  She's a very young and happy woman with every desire to get ahead.  She lives near the parish of Santa Ana in Cuenca, a place of beautiful scenery because of its rugged geography.  The people there make a living in agriculture and raising animals, and many work in the city.

Lourdes is the single mother of a three-year-old girl.  She still doesn't have her own house so she rents.

Lourdes works as a domestic servant all day Monday through Friday.  At home she raises and sells chickens.  These activities allow her to improve her economic situation.

She's going to invest her new loan in buying chickens to grow more in this business.

Her dream is to have a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Rosa Celia

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es una socia que forma parte activamente del banco comunal Unión Progresista, es una mujer luchadora que ve en su trabajo diario la mejor manera de mejorar su estabilidad económica y sacar en adelante a toda su familia. Vive por la parroquia de Santa Ana en Cuenca, lugar que cuenta con hermosos paisajes gracias a su geografía accidentada, su gente se dedica al comercio, crianza de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad.

La Señora Rosa tiene 29 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 12, 10 y 8 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Rosa labora en diferentes actividades, es empleada domestica en una casa de la ciudad, n su casa cría cerdos, pollos, ganado y también se dedica a la agricultura, estas actividades le permiten solventar los gastos de su hogar y sacar adelante a su familia.
 
Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de abono y para mejorar sus cultivos y en ganado, ahora su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para continuar con este negocio. En la cancelación de su crédito anterior lo realizo en las fechas correspondientes sin dificultad alguna. La banca comunal le gusta por la unión y compañerismo de todas las socias.
texts.en:
Rosa is an active member of the communal bank Unión Progresista. She is a hard working woman that sees in her daily work the best way of improving her economic stability and moving her entire family. She lives in the parish of Santa Ana in Cuenca, a place that has beautiful landscapes thanks to its location. The people make a living in trade, livestock, agriculture and many work in the city. 

Rosa is 29 years old, is married and has three children within the marriage who are 12, 10, and 8 years old. Her first son is studying in secondary school and the two youngest are in the local elementary school. Her husband works as a mason in construction. The house in which they live is their own.

Rosa has several jobs. She is a domestic employee in a house in the city, in her home she raises pigs, chickens and livestock and also works in agriculture. These activities allow her to cover the household expenses and move her family forward. 

Her previous loan was invested in buying fertilizer and to improve her crops and livestock. Her new credit will now be invested in buying chickens to continue this business. She made payments to her previous loan according to the dates established without any trouble. She likes the communal bank because of the unity and companionship of the members.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Enrique Yankele

texts.es:
Enrique es un joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, la cual tiene muchos atractivos turisticos como por ejemplo las "Lineas de Nazca". Enrique es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelnte, sobre todo porque es padre de u pequeño de 2 años de edad a quien quiere muchisimo y junto a su esposa luchan cada dia para poder brindarles una vida digna. Debido a sus pocos recursos economicos el solo logro estudiar hasta el Cuarto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado terminar la secundaria. 

Desde muy temprano Enrique sale a trabajar como chofer de taxi, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al dia y tambien junto a su padre tiene un pequeño negocio de lavado de autos, el cree que esta saliendo adelante en su negocio porque atiende a sus clientes de manera amable y con mucho respeto.

Enrique esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo el podra comprar materiales para su negocio de lavado de auto como magueras a presion, liquiso para autos, cera, entr otros; de esta manera el podra tener los materiales necearios para poder realizar su trabajo y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Darle una buena educacion a su hijo y tener una empresa de taxis.
texts.en:
Enrique, 19, is a young man living in the city of Nazca which has many tourist attractions like the “Nazca Lines, for example.  Enrique is a young man who very much wants to get ahead, above all because he’s the father of a little two-year-old boy he loves very much.  He and his wife strive daily to provide a proper life.  Because of his limited economic resources, he only completed fourth year of secondary school but would have liked to finish secondary school.

Starting very early Enrique starts out to work as a taxi driver.  He works around 8 hours daily and with his father also has a small car wash business.  He believes he’s getting ahead in his business because he tends to his customers kindly and very respectfully.

Enrique is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their great support he will be able to buy supplies like pressure hoses, vehicle fluids, wax, among others for his car wash business in order to have the necessary materials on-hand to do his work and continue striving to reach his greatest dream: to give his son a good education and own a taxi company.

loans.use: to buy pressure hoses, vehicle fluids, among others.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge es un joven de  18 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con sus padres y hermanos, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, gracias a su esfuerzo pudo culminar sus estudios secundarios satisfactoriamente, ahora sueña con estudiar la carrera profesional de Medicina Veterinaria, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jorge trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcciones, como maderas, esteras, plásticos y palos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder hacer refacciones en su vivienda, ya que actualmente la fachada de su hogar es de esteras y no brinda mucha seguridad, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante al lado de su familia y ser un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Jorge, 18, is a young man living in the city of Chincha with his parents and siblings.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person with  a strong drive for self-improvement.  Thanks to his efforts he succeeded in completing his secondary education satisfactorily.  Now, he dreams with studying the career of Veterinary Medicine.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer with his friends and sometimes cooks a delicious ‘Carapulcra con Sopa Seca’ to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Jorge works as a field hand on an agricultural estate in his city.  He works every day starting in the very early hours of the morning and can work for about 8 hours daily.  He feels good doing his work and thinks he does well because of the good work he does and the kind way he treats others.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy building materials and supplies like lumber, matting, plastic, beams, etc. that will be very useful for him to do some home improvements since the façade on his house is currently of matting and not very secure.  He will thus be able to continue working and striving to continue forward alongside his family and to become a good professional.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Humberto

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de27 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposa y sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su esposa dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, gracias a su esfuerzo Jorge pudo iniciar una carrera militar, el es Policía, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ceviche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jorge trabaja como Policía Municipal en una institución publica de su ciudad, el brinda servicios de seguridad ciudadana y trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas, haciéndolo por un promedio de 12 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de prendas de vestir, para poder iniciar un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, de esta manera el podrá generar mayores ingresos para su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jorge, 27, is a man living in the city of Pucallpa with his wife and two, small children who he loves and are his main reason for living.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who together with his wife focuses all their efforts into moving their family forward.  Thanks to his efforts, Jorge was able to start a military career, he’s a police officer.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer with his friends and sometimes cooks a delicious “ceviche” to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Jorge works as a Municipal Police Officer in one of his city’s public institutions.  He provides security for citizens and works every day starting very early for about 12 hours daily.  He feels good doing his work and believes he does well because of the way he does his work and the kind treatment he gives others.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy clothes to start a small business selling clothes.   In this way, he will be able to generate higher family income and he’ll continue working and striving to reach his greatest dream: to own a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Ali

texts.es:
Ali vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy calido y acogedor, asimismo posee muchos paisajes maravillosos. Ali e spadre de 5 hijos a quienes quiere muchisimo pero hace algunos años uno de sus hijos fallecio y para el fue muy doloroso,paso mucho tiempo para que pueda reponerse pero aun en su corazon recuerda a su hijo. A pesar de esta pena Ali saco fuerzas y siguio adelante, sobre todo para demostrarle a sus hijos que a pesar de las trsitesas se puede seguir adelante.

Día a día Ali trabja como empleado en una pequeña empresa de su ciudad, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al dia y el cree que esta saliendo adelante por que es responsable y sobre todo porque tieen un angel que lo protege desde el cielo.

Ali esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo el podra realziar unmantenimiento yu arreglo a msu moto con la cual se dirige a su centro de labores, ya que s el unico medio que tiene para transportarse, asi de esta manera el podra mejorar sus ingresos ya que no gastara mucho en movilidad y seguira luchando por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener uan tienda de repuestos de vehiculos".
texts.en:
Ali lives in the city of Pucallpa, which is characterized by a warm and welcoming climate and beautiful scenery. Ali has five children, whom he loves very much. Some years ago, one of his children died, which was very painful for him. It took a long time for him to recover, but he still has the memory of his son in his heart. In spite of this pain, Ali found the strength to continue on, above all to demonstrate to his children that one can move forward in the face of grief.

Ali works day to day as an employee for a small company in his city. He works for about ten hours per day. He believes that he is successful because he is responsible, and above all because he has an angel in heaven who protects him.

Ali is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their great support he will be able to perform maintenance and repairs on his motorcycle, which he uses to drive to work. It is his only means of transportation, so this will help him to improve his income because he will not spend very much on transport. He will continue working to make his greatest dream come true: to have a spare auto parts store.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Jenny Raquel

texts.es:
Jenny es una mujer de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su hijo, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia, ya que ella es madre y padre para su hijo; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Yenny no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Gastronomía que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jenny trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, adicionalmente también tiene otro negocio de venta de bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le  va  bien por los buenos precios y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Jenny se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como polos, shorts, blusas, pantalones y otros, de esta manera tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y su local comercial.
texts.en:
Jenny is a 47 year old woman.  She lives in the city of Pisco with her son.  She loves him, and he is her main focus in life.  She is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person.  She devotes all of her efforts into getting her family ahead because she is both mother and father to her son.  Sadly, due to lack of financial resources and the need to work, Jenny was not able to study for the professional culinary career that she wanted.  However, she would very much have liked to be able to do so.

In her free time she likes to play sports.  Sometimes she cooks the delicious "aji de gallina" (chili pepper chicken, a Peruvian chicken stew) to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with much effort and enthusiasm, Jenny works in her small business selling clothes.  She also has another business of selling drinks.  She works every day, starting very early in the morning, and she is able to work approximately 12 hours.  She likes doing her work, and she believes that it is going very well because of the good prices and the kind way she treats her customers.

Jenny is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to their help she will be able to buy merchandise like polo style shirts, shorts, blouses, pants, and others.  This way she will have her business better stocked.  She wants to do this in order to be able to tend to more customers.  This way she will continue working and putting forth great effort in order to achieve her big dream of having her own house and her place of business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like polo style shirts, shorts, blouses, pants, and others.

loans.name: Jorge Santos

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre de 38 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Jorge no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Jorge trabaja como obrero en una empresa de reciclado de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Jorge se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la refacción y el mantenimiento general de su moto, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder transportarse a su centro de trabajo, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir adelante y lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Jorge, 38, is a man living in the city of Ica.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person with a strong wish for self-improvement.  Unfortunately, due to limited economic resources and because he needed to work, he was unable to study a professional career but he very much would have liked to do so.  In his free time he enjoys playing soccer with his friends and sometimes cooks a delicious “Arroz con Pollo” to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Jorge works as a laborer for a local recycling firm.  He works every day starting very early and works about 8 hours daily.  He feels good at work and thinks he does well because of the good way he does his work and the kind treatment he gives others.

Jorge is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to repair and service his motorcycle which will be very useful for him to get to and from work and he will continue working and striving towards getting ahead and reaching his dream of owning a house.

loans.use: to service his motorcycle.

loans.name: Ana Cristina

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer de 23 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su pareja y su pequeño hijo de dos años, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Ana no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional,  pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ana trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos precios y por las facilidades de pago que brinda a sus clientes.
Ana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mercadería, tales como polos, blusas, shorts, entre otras prendas de vestir de temporada, de esta manera tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido y podrá atender a mas clientes, así pues Ana seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para salir lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ana, 23, is a woman living in the city of Chincha with her spouse and little two-year-old son who she loves and who  are her main reason for living.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who together with her spouse focuses all their efforts into moving their family forward.  Unfortunately, due to limited economic resources and the need to work, Ana was unable to study a professional career but would very much have liked to do so.  In her free time she likes to watch television and sometimes cooks a delicious “Carapulcra” to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with much effort and dedication, Ana works in a small business selling clothes and beverages.  She works every day starting very early in the morning and can work for about 10 hours daily.  She feels good doing her work and thinks she does well because of her good prices and the easy payment terms she offers her customers.

Ana is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to buy merchandise like shirts, blouses and shorts, among other seasonal articles of clothing.  In this way, she will have the business better stocked and will be able to take care of more customers.  Thus, Ana will continue working and striving to get ahead and reach her great dream of finishing building her house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 38 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y su pequeño hijo, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Mario no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Agronomía que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Mario trabaja como maestro constructor, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos acabados de su trabajo y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Mario se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, tales como arena, cemento, ladrillos y otros, los cuales le servirán de mucho para poder culminar la construcción de su vivienda, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propia empresa y brindar la mejora calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 38 years old. He lives in the city of Ica with his partner and their young son, whom he loves and who are his main reason for living. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of his efforts to support his family, along with his partner. 

Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to begin working, Mario was not able to study a professional degree in agriculture, but he would have very much liked to do so. In his free time, he likes to watch television. Occasionally he cooks a delicious Carapulcra (a Peruvian stew made with meat and potatoes) to share with his family.

By his own initiative and with plenty of effort and dedication, Mario works as a master constructor. He works for eight hours per day, beginning in the early morning. He is happy with his work and he believes it is going well because of his good finishing touches and the friendly manner in which he treats his clients.

Mario is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, he will be able to buy construction materials such as sand, cement, and bricks, among others. This will be very helpful for him as he completes the construction of his home. He will continue working and putting in effort to achieve his dream of having his own company and providing the best quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover repair costs and installing electricity.

loans.name: Rom

texts.en:
Rom is a 62-year-old mother of four children, and a resident of a rural village of the Ek Phnom district. The main source of her family’s income is oranges harvested from trees planted on three hectares of farmland. The family supplements their income by selling corn and bananas in the local area. She has been in this business for thirty years. Lacking capital to buy fertilizers for applying to her farmland is the main challenge for Rom's farming business.

This is the fourth loan for Rom with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She successfully paid back the previous loans, which helped her to better support her family with enough food. Now she is asking for a loan of US$1,000 to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her orange grove business. Rom hopes this loan will enable her to grow her orange crop healthfully and fruitfully, so as to sell it for a good price and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticides for her orange-growing business

loans.name: Rav

texts.en:
Living in a thatched-roof house in a rural village of the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province, Rav is 25 years old and single. To make a living, she has been farming rice and working as a paid worker in local area to earn extra income. Having been in this business for ten years, she is able to earn about 12,000 KHR per day to meet her needs. 
Rav is on her first microloan with VisionFund. She is applying for a loan of 1,000,000KHR. With this loan, she is going to buy fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice quickly so as to improve her standard of living and fulfill her dream to raise chickens for additional income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Saroen

texts.en:
Saroen, 44, lives in a rural area of the Sampov Meas district of Pursat province. She is married with eight children, one of whom is dependent on her and works as a paid construction worker to better support the family. The family’s main source of income is from rice farming on one hectare of farmland while her husband complements the income by working as a paid worker in local area. Together, they are able to earn about 33,000KHR per day and they can manage to save about 12,000KHR each day after offsetting daily expenses. 
Saroen is just with VisionFund this cycle. She is seeking a loan of 1,000,000KHR to buy fertilizers for her farmland and use a portion of it to spend on buying chickens and piglets to raise to earn extra income. She hopes to gain more income from her current business so as to better make a living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Jose Amador

texts.es:
Jose vive en la ciudad de Carhuaz, ubicada en la sierra peruana y alberga a uno de los atyractivos turisticos muy visitados por los turistas el cual es el Nevado de Pastoruri. Jose es un hombre muy trabajador, desde muy joven aprendio a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frenet ya que sus padres tenian pocos recursos economicos el tuvo la necesidad de trabajar desde pequeño para poder apoyarlos, pero a pesar de las adversidades logro estudiar la carrera de Profesor.

Debido a la falta de empleo Jose inicio su negocio de carpinteria, animado por su padre, quien le enseño el oficio desde muy pequeño, jose trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y puede atender hasta 5 clientes diariamente; el cree que esta saliendo adelnate con su negocio porque e smuy resposanble y honrado con los clientes.

Jose esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra comprar madera para realziar sus trabajo de carpintería y de esta manera tener los materiales necesarios y mejorar sus ingresos, lo que le permitira seguir luchando para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener una gran carpinteria".
texts.en:
Jose lives in the city of Carhuaz in the Peruvian highlands, where one of the most picturesque and popular tourist attractions, the Nevado de Pastoruri Mountain, is located. Jose is a very hardworking man. From a very young age he learned to earn a crust by the sweat of his own brow, as his parents had few economic resources. As a result, he had to work from a young age to support them. Nonetheless, despite adversities, he managed to study to become a teacher.

Jose set up his carpentry business due to the lack of jobs. He was encouraged by his father who taught him these skills when he was growing up. Jose works around 9 hours and can assist up to 5 clients a day. He believes that his business is going well because he is responsible and honest with clients.

Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as their help has enabled him to purchase wood for his carpentry work and so he has the materials he needs. In this way he can improve his income. This allows him to continue working to make his greatest dream a reality, that is “To have a large carpentry business”.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Julio Edilberto

texts.es:
Julio e sun hombre muy trabajador, es padre de 3 hijos a quienes ha sacado adelnate solo ya que su esposa los abandono cuando eran pequeño y desde ese moento se convirtio en madre y padre para sus hijos y es asi que con mucho esfuerzo logro sacarlos adelante y aunque ahora son mayores de edad el siempre esta pendiente de ellos y sus hijos lo quiere mucho. Día a dia Julio trabaja como pescador, desde hace 5 años, primero empezo a trabajar como buzo en una embarcación, luego de mucho ahorro pudo comprar sus herramientas, tiempo despues logro comprar su embarcacion , en la cual actualmente trabaja; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es responable y sobre todo porque tiene mucha fe en Dios.

julio esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con la ayuda que le han brindado el podra realizar un mantenimiento a su motor de su embarcacion fuera de borda y comprara tambien redes para poder pescar porque las que tiene actualmente estan viejitas y rotas; a si el podra tener una embarcacion en buen estado y tener las herramientas necesarias para su labro, lo que le permitira mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Ternminar de Construir su vivienda de material noble".
texts.en:
Julio is a hard-working man and father to three children who he has brought up alone as their mother left them when they were small. Since then, he became mother and father to his children and with lots of effort he managed to bring them up well. Now, they have grown up, he still watches out for them and they love him very much.

Julio has worked as a fisherman every day for the last 5 years. He first started to work as a diver on a boat, then after much saving he was able to buy tools and later on bought his own boat, which he still works with today. He believes that his work is going well because he is responsible and especially because he has great faith in God. 

Julio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, with their help, he will be able to do some repairs on his boat's motor outboard and he will also buy some nets to be able to fish because the ones he has at the moment are old and broken. He will therefore be able to have a well-maintained boat and the necessary equipment for his job which will help him bring in more money and keep fighting to make his great dream come true: "To finish building his house from bricks".

loans.use: to fix his boat's motor.

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es:
Jose es un joven muy carismatico y alegre, el tiene 18 años y a su corta edad apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. la vivienda de Jose se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por el cultivo de uva , de la cual se prepara el producto badera de nuestro pais el cual es el "Pisco". Jose no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria debido a sus pocos recursos economicos, pero le hubeira encantado Estudiar Gastronomia.

Con mucho entusiasmo Jose trabaja como albañil, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al dia, ya que depende del tamaño de las construcciones; el cree que esta saliendo adelante con su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo tiene buenos acabados.

Jose esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra realziar mejoras en su vivienda ya que construira una especie de toldo para poder alquilar ese espacio para compromisos sociales, de esta manera el tendra un ingreso mas y podra mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, asi el seguira luchando cada dia para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener su casa propia y aseguir apoyando a sus padres".
texts.en:
Jose is a charismatic and joyful young person. He is 18 years old and at this young age already helps his parents with the household costs. Jose's house is in the city of Ica, where grapes are cultivated to make the famous national drink, Pisco, a grape brandy.

Jose couldn't study due to his economic circumstances but he would have loved to study Gastronomy. With much enthusiasm, Jose works as a builder. He works around 10 hours a day but it depends on the size of each project. He believes that he is doing well at work because he's responsible and especially because he finishes things well. 

Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because through their help he is able to improve his house. With this money he will build a kind of awning that will make it possible to rent out this space for social engagements. Through this, he will be able to bring in more income and improve the quality of his family's life. He will continue to fight every day to be able to make his great dream come true: "To have his own house and keep supporting his parents".

loans.use: To improve his house

loans.name: Luz Karina

texts.es:
Luz vive en el distrito iqueño de Subtanjalla, es madre de 2 pequeño de 10 y 9 años, para luz sus hijos son lo mas importante que Dios le ha dado y sobre todo son su razon de vivir y de luchar cada dia desde que el sol aparace porque Luz quiere que sus hijos tengan todo lo que lla no tuvo y sean mucho mejor que ella. 

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Luz inicio su negocio de venta de abarrotes, Luz inicio su bodega solo con algunas botellas de gaseosa y 2 abarrotes pero poco a poco fue adquiriendo mas productos para ofrecer en su negocio, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al dia y atiende a varios clientes; ella crew que esta saliendo adelnate con su negocio porque es responsable y sobre todo porque es amable y carismatica con los clientes.

Luz esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podra comprar maderas para poder realziar mejoras en el techo de su vivienda, de esta manera podra mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Darle una buena educacion a su hija y tener un local en el centro de la ciudad".
texts.en:
Luz lives in the Subtanjalla district of Ica. She is mother to 2 little ones, aged 10 and 9. Her children are the most important thing that God has given her and they are her reason for living and for fighting everyday as soon as the sun comes up. Luz wants her children to have everything that she didn't have and to have more opportunities than she did. 

With much effort and saving, Luz opened her grocery business. It started with only a couple of bottles of fizzy drinks and a couple of packets of food but little by little she has acquired more products to offer. She dedicates around 9 hours a day to her work and attends to several customers. She believes that she is doing well because she's responsible and especially because she's friendly and charismatic with her customers. 

Luz is very thankful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she will be able to buy wood to do some repairs on her roof. In this way, she will be able to improve the quality of their lives and keep fighting to accomplish her dream: "To give her daughter a good education and have a shop in the city centre".

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina es una joven de 18 años de edad que vive en la ciudad de Chincha, Perú. Ella es una joven que disfruta mucho de escuchar su música favorita y tejer algunas prendas u adornos para decorar su casa. Karina es una joven que culminó el colegio hace unos cuantos meses y ya está convertida en una micro-empresaria. Esta ejemplar muchacha se dedica a la confección y venta de tejido de canastas en la puerta de su casa, este tipo de productos es muy comercializado en la ciudad de Chincha, pueden ofrecer desde sillas hasta carteras, bonitas, simples y coloridas. Karina vive en el centro de donde toda esta actividad se desarrolla, el distrito de “Grocio Prado” conocido principalmente por la beata “MELCHORITA”, una mujer que decidió seguir muy de cerca la vida de Dios, una hermosa historia de fe y gracia. Es en este lugar en donde las personas venden todo tipo de pulseras y collares con imágenes de “MELCHORITA”, a su vez es el único lugar en donde venden en distintos modelos y diseños las carteras que Karina vende. Ella nos comenta que fue su madre la que anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de este tipo de productos y fue así como Karina aprendió desde muy niña sobre este arte. Actualmente ella cuida y vela por su madre ya que ella ya no puede vender porque su visión no es muy buena, pero en algunas ocasiones ayuda a Karina a tejer, debido a que el arte del tejido se lleva en las manos. Karina sabe que sus productos son de buena calidad y que hace tejido distinto a los demás, emplea un bonito estilo para poder competir. Por el momento ella solo vende los días miércoles y sábados, en el transcurso de la semana ella se dedica a la recepción de pedidos. Esta es la segunda vez que los prestatarios Kiva le brindan su apoyo , Karina podrá realizar la compra de Juncos, Totora, Pintura, entre otros materiales que son necesarios para la confección de sus productos,y podra realizar mejoras en su vivienda como mejoramiento de paredes y techo; ella está muy entusiasmada porque sabe que si realiza la compra ahora los materiales le saldrán mucho más baratos, debido a que es esta temporada en donde los precios bajan. Karina tiene una visión a futuro en su fructífero negocio es por ello que quiere fidelizar a su clientes con la variedad de productos ofrecidos, con este incremento de ganancias podrá cumplir su gran sueño “Ser una empresaria exitosa y desde luego aprender otro tipo de arte para ampliar la variedad de sus productos”.
texts.en:
Karina is an 18-year-old young woman that lives in the city of Chincha, Peru. She is a young woman that really enjoys listening to her favorite music and  weaving clothing or adornments to decorate her house. Karina is a young woman that finished high school a few months ago and has already become a small business owner. This exemplary girl makes a living from making and selling woven baskets in the doorway of her house. This type of product is very commercialized in Chincha, which offers everything from chairs to handbags that are pretty, simple and colorful.

Karina lives in the center of the city where this activity is developed, in the “Grocio Prado” district known primarily for the blessed “MELCHORITA,” a woman that decided to follow the life of God very closely, a beautiful story of faith and grace. This is where people sell all kinds of bracelets and necklaces with images of the “MELCHORITA.” It is also the only place where you can buy the various models and designs of the handbags that Karina sells. She tells us that her mother used to make a living from selling these types of products and that was how Karina learned this art from the time that she was a little girl. Currently she cares for and watches over her mother as she cannot sell any longer because her vision isn't very good, but sometimes she helps Karina weave, because the weaving art is done with the hands. Karina knows that her products are good quality and that she makes products different from the others. She employs a pretty style to be able to compete. For the moment she only sells on Wednesdays and Saturdays. During the week she is dedicated to requests she receives.

This is the second time that the Kiva lenders have provided their support. Karina will be able to buy reeds, totora and paint, among other materials that are necessary for making her products, and she will be able to make improvements to her home such as improving the walls and roof. She is very enthusiastic because she knows that if she buys the materials now they will be very cheap, since the prices are lower during this season. Karina has a vision for the future of her fruitful business, so she wants her clients to be loyal with the variety of products she offers. With this increase in earnings she will be able to achieve her greatest dream, “To be a successful business owner and then to learn another type of art to broaden the variety of her products."

loans.use: to buy materials like reeds and paints and to improve her home.

loans.name: Silverio Marcial

texts.es:
Silverio es un hombre muy trabajador, dedes muy temprano se levanta cada dia para poder realizar syu trabajo como chofer de taxi, ya que con el fruto de su trabajo y el apoyo de su esposa puede solventar los gastos del hogar con mucho esfuerzo y sobre todo ganas de salir adelante; mas aun porque Silverio es padre de 2 hijos de 16 y 6 años a quienes quiere mucho y lucha cada dia por darle una vida digna y sobre todo para que sean personas de bien.

Silverio esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que es la segunda vez que le brindan su valioso apoyo y gracias a ello realiar un mentenimiento general a su vehiculo y tambien realizar un pintado, de esta manera tendra un vehiculo en buenas condiciones y sobre todo comodo para atender a los clientes, de esta manera mejorara sus ingresos y seguira luchando cadad dia para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" DArle una buena educacion a sus hijos y tener uan empresa de taxis".
texts.en:
Silverio is a hardworking man. He wakes up early in the morning every day and starts working. He is a taxi driver. With the fruits of his labor and his wife’s support he can cover his home expenses. He puts a lot of effort into his job and has a strong will to succeed in life. Silverio has two children, 16 and 6 years old. He loves them and fights every day to give them a decent living and most of all, to make them into respectable persons.

Silverio appreciates the help that Kiva lenders have given him. This is the second time he gets their valuable support, and thanks to that he will be able to perform an overall maintenance on his vehicle, including a paint job. His car will perform better and he will be able to offer his clients a more comfortable service. This will result in better income.

He will continue fighting every day so that he can make his dream come true: “To give his children a good education and to have his own taxi company.”

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his taxi.

loans.name: Yessica Maria

texts.es:
Yessica  tiene  años de edad, ella vive en Ica, Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente. En su tiempo libre disfruta pasear y visitar a su familia;  como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que le gusta mucho a Yessica  es el “arroz con pollo”; Yessica estudió hasta quinto año de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser profesora. Ella es conviviente y su esposo labora como Maestro constructor, juntos tienen 2  hijos cuyas edades comprenden  7 y 11 años los cuales cursan estudios primarios.	

"yessica trabaja en la venta de huevos, se dedica a este trabajo 6 diarias y puede atender hasta 10 clientes, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque ofrece productos de calidad y brinda una buena atención a sus clientes
Actualmente Yessica está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo ya que  gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más mercadería, como huevos al por mayor, lo que le permitirá tener más productos para vender  y aumentar sus ingresos y así seguir trabajando para cumplir  su gran sueño: “Terminar de construir su casa."
texts.en: Yessica lives in Ica, Peru, which is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima and is called "Land of the Sun" by Peruvians. It is known in the country for its frequent earthquakes (8.0 in 2007, 6.9 in 2011), its production of grapes, asparagus and olives, and, most of all, as the source of the national drink of Peru, Pisco. In this hot and arid climate we find Jessica's home and business. In her free time she likes to go on walks and visit family. She knows full well that Peru is known for having some of the most delicious food in the world, and one of her favorites dishes is rice with chicken. She went to school through high school but she would like to study to be a professional. Yessica is married, and her husband works as a master builder. They have two children, who are 7 and 11 and are in elementary school. Yessica makes a living selling eggs, and she works six days a week tending up to 10 customers. She thinks the business is going well because she offers quality products and provides good customer service. Yessica is very grateful to Kiva lenders since this is the second time you have provided your support, and thanks to that she will be able to purchase more supplies, like eggs at wholesale, which will allow her to have more products to sell and increase her profits so she can continue toward her biggest dream: finishing construction on her home.

loans.use: to purchase eggs.

loans.name: Amador Roque

texts.es:
Roque vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido y acogedor, se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, esparrago, entre otros. Roque es padre soltero, debido a circunstancias ajenas tuvo que convertirse en padre y madre para sus 2 hijos, los cuales tiene actualmente 18 y 6 años y por quienes lucha cada día para poder convertirlos en personas de bien y sobre todo sean mejores que el. Roque trabaja día a día como obrero en un fundo de su ciudad, con lo cual puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de su hogar; el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarias y él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante y ser un orgullo para sus hijos.

Roque está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y gracias a ello podrá comprar una cocina ya que actualmente cocina a leña, de esta manera evitara accidentes, de esta manera podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Roque lives in the city of Ica, which is characterized for having a very warm and inviting climate. Agriculture has developed there, especially the cultivation of cotton and asparagus, among others. Roque is a single father. Due to other circumstances, he had to become father and mother to his two children, who are now 18 and 6 years old and for whom he strives every day to be able to make them good people and above all to be better than himself. Roque works every day as a laborer on a property in his city, with which, and with great effort, he is able to pay his household expenses. He works about 8 hours a day, and he believes that his work is going well for him because he is very friendly with the customers and above all because he has a great will to advance and to be a source of pride for his children.

Roque is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since this is the second time that they have offered him their great support, and thanks to that he will be able to buy a stove, since he is now cooking with firewood. In this way he will avoid accidents, and in this way he will be able to offer a better quality of life to his children and continue striving every day to be able to make his greatest dream a reality: to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy a stove

loans.name: Gloria Santosa

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer muy luchadora y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Nazca es una ciudad peruana ubicada en la región centro-sur del Perú, Nazca es una ciudad muy activa, debido a la afluencia de turistas que visitan a diario las milenarias Líneas de Nazca, y también por el desarrollo en auge minero, agrícola y comercial de la zona, que la están convirtiendo en unas de las ciudades más cosmopolitas del sur peruano; es madre de 4 hijos a los cuales ama muchísimo y son su razón de vivir; como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida por ello uno de los platillos que más le gusta es el riquísimo: “Ceviche”, gloria solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Administración de empresas.

Gloria trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 12 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 20 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y porque ofrece productos de calidad.

Gloria está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su valioso apoya y gracias a esa gran ayuda ella podrá realizar mejoras en su negocio como colocar un pequeño toldo en la parte de afuera de su negocio y así brindar más comodidad a sus clientes lo que le permitirá tener más clientes y seguir luchando cada día para cumplir su gran sueño:” Terminar de construir su Casa”
texts.en:
Gloria is a very determined and enthusiastic woman. She lives in the city of Nazca. It is a Peruvian city located in the south-central region of Peru. Nazca is a very active city due to large number of tourists that visit the ancient Nazca Lines daily, and also due to the zone's development boom in mining, agriculture, and commercial activity that is transforming it into one of the most cosmopolitan cities of southern Peru. She is a mother of 4 children whom she loves very much and they are her reason for living. Like any other Peruvian, she enjoys food very much; one of the dishes that she enjoys the most is the delicious ceviche. Gloria only studied until the 5th year of secondary school, but she would have liked to study business administration. 

Gloria works in her business selling groceries. She works around 12 hours daily and can assist up to 20 customers per day. She believes that her business is going well because she is friendly to customers and because she offers quality products.

Gloria is very grateful for the Kiva lenders since it is the second time that they are providing her with valuable support. Thanks to this great support she will be able to make improvements to her business such as hanging a small awning outside as to offer more comfort to her customers which will permit her to have more customers and to continue striving each day to fulfill her great dream: to finish the construction of her home.

loans.use: to purchase awnings

loans.name: Erick Alain

texts.es:
Erick es muy trabajador y entusiasta, tiene 34 años, vive al lado de su esposa y de su hijo de 5 añitos de edad, el cual le saca canas verdes porque es muy travieso, pero a pesar de ello no deja de luchar día a día para darle una vida feliz y con calidad ya que el lo ama muchísimo. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, esta ciudad se caracteriza por su clima caluroso en cualquier época del año,tambien se encuentra la laguna de Huacachina, la cual es visitada por infinidad de turistas en cualquier época del año, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura sobre todo el cultivo de algodón, paprika, esparrago y uva. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta arreglar cosas, pero también en algunas oportunidades aprovecha para comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. El solo tuvo estudios secundarios pero le hubiera gustado estudiar “Ingeniería Civil”.

Con mucho entusiasmo el día a día sale a trabajar en su negocio como operario de construcción, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque siempre lo llaman para realizar trabajos ya que es muy responsable y cumplido.

Erick está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran ayuda y gracias a ello en esta oportunidad podrá comprar maderas para su trabajo,así el podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Erick is very hard-working and enthusiastic. He is 34 years old. He lives at the side of his wife and 5-year-old son who is quite a handful because he is very mischievous, but nevertheless he doesn't stop striving day by day to give him a happy and quality life since he loves him very much. His home is located in the city of Ica. This city is known for its hot weather in any given season of the year. Also, the Haucachina Lagoon is found here which is visited by countless tourists in any given season of the year. In addition, the city's agriculture is flourishing, above all in the growing of cotton, paprika, asparagus, and grapes. When he has spare time, he likes to fix things, but sometimes, he also takes advantage of these opportunities by eating one of his favorite dishes which is the delicious arroz con pollo [rice with chicken]. He only had secondary studies, but he would have liked to study Civil Engineering.

With much enthusiasm, he goes to work day after day in his business as a construction equipment operator. He works in his business around 10 hours a day. He believes that his business is going well because people always call him to do jobs since he is very responsible and polite.

Erick is very grateful for the Kiva lenders since it is the second time that they are providing him support and thanks to this opportunity, he will be able to buy lumber for his job so he will be able to continue working in order to accomplish his greatest dream: to provide his son with a profession.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es:
Zenaida tiene 23 años de edad, es muy trabajadora y sobre todo tiene mucho optimista y ganas de superación, es madre de un pequeño a quien saca adelante y por quien daría la vida con tal de verlos feliz y sobre todo que sea mucho mejor que ella. Vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, así como también se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de esparrago, uva, algodón, paprika, entre otros. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho escuchar música y en ocasiones le gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la riquísima Carapulcra con sopa seca. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el cuarto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar enfermería.

Con mucho entusiasmo Zenaida trabaja en su negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 23 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo vende productos de calidad a un precio cómodo.

Zenaida está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y gracia a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería como dulces, bebidas gaseosas, fideos, conservas, entre otros, así ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y poder atender de mejor manera a los clientes, lo que le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando cada día para a hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Zenaida is 23 years old. She is very hardworking, and above all, she has an optimism and desire to excel. She is a mother of a young boy for whom she keeps moving forward and for whom she would give her life to see happy and much better than her. She lives in the city of Ica which is noted for its hot weather as well as its flourishing agriculture, especially in the cultivation of asparagus, grapes, cotton, and paprika among others. When she has free time, she likes to listen to music and at times she likes to eat one of her favorite dishes: the rich Carapulcra con sopa seca. Due to the limited financial resources of her parents, she only was able to study until the fourth grade of her secondary education, but she would have liked to have studied nursing. 

With much enthusiasm, Zenaida works in her business of selling groceries. She works in her business around 8 hours a day and can attend up to 23 customers per day. She believes that her business is going well because she is very kind with her customers and above all she sells quality products at an affordable price. 

Zenaida is very grateful for the Kiva lenders since this is the second time that they are providing their great support. Thanks to their assistance she will be able to buy more merchandise such as candy, soft drinks, noodles, and canned goods among other things and so she will be able to have a greater variety of products and will be able to attend to her customers better. This will allow her to increase her income and continue striving every day in order to realize her greatest dream: "to have her own home."

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as candy, soft drinks, noodles, and canned goods among other things.

loans.name: Clemencia Doralisa

texts.es:
Clemencia es una mujer muy dedicada y amorosa, es madre de 3 hijos los cuales ha sacado adelante con mucho amor y esfuerzo ya que el padre de sus hijos se separo de ella; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, así como también por ser visitada por infinidad de turistas que desean conocer “La laguna de Huacachina”, asimismo es una ciudad que se caracteriza por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de esparrago, algodón y uva. Cuando Clemencia tiene un tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión en especial sus novelas favoritas, asimismo le gusta preparar uno de los platillos que más le gustan el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”. Clemencia solo tuvo estudios secundario debido a que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar ´para ser profesora.

Día a Día Clemencia abre su negocio de venta de bebidas como gaseosas, refrescos y cervezas, trabaja alrededor de 12 horas al día  y puede atender hasta 30 clientes en el día, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque brinda una buena atención a sus clientes.

Clemencia está  muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran ayuda y en esta oportunidad podrá mejorar su vivienda, ya que refaccionara su piso y refaccionar las paredes, así mejorar su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una mejor Calidad de Vida”.
texts.en:
Clemencia is a very dedicated and loving woman. She is the mother of three children whom she has raised with much love and effort, since the father of her children separated from her. Her house is located in the city of Ica, a city characterized by having a warm climate in every season of the year and also for being visited by a countless number of tourists who want to see the Huacachina Lagoon. It is also a city characterized by its agriculture, especially the cultivation of asparagus, cotton, and grapes. When Clemencia has free time, she likes to watch television, especially her favorite soap operas. She also likes to prepare one of the dishes that she likes most, which is the very delicious chicken with rice. Clemencia only went to secondary school, since her parents had few economic resources, but she would have very much liked to study to be a teacher.

Day after day Clemincia opens her beverage sales business, where she sells soft drinks, cold beverages, and beer. She works about 12 hours a day and can serve up to 30 customers a day. She feels that her business is going well for her because she offers good service to her customers.

Clemencia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since this is the second time they have offered her their great help, and on this occasion she will be able to improve her house, since she will refurbish her floor and walls and thus improve her quality of life, and she will continue striving to make her great dream a reality: to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to improve her home (refurbish the walls and floors)

loans.name: Olga Fanny

texts.es:
Olga Fanny de 48 años de edad, es ama de casa y se dedica al oficio de la confección desde hace 15 años. Actividad que le permite generar ingresos para colaborarle a su esposo con los gastos familiares. Realiza prendas sobre medida.
Olga tiene un gran sueño por el cual comienza a trabajar para hacerlo realidad, para lograrlo se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que financiará la compra de telas para la elaboración de prendas deportivas las cuales distribuirá en almacenes del municipio de Rionegro, Colombia. Asegura que éste será el comienzo para crear una gran empresa con la que espera beneficiar a muchas madres cabeza de familia, dándoles la oportunidad de laborar y generar ingresos.
texts.en:
Olga Fanny is 48 years old. She is a housewife and has worked as a dressmaker for 15 years. It's a business that allows her to generate income to help her husband with the family expenses. She makes made-to-measure clothes. 

Olga has a great dream and she is starting to work to make it a reality. To achieve this she is applying for a loan to finance the cost of buying fabric for the manufacture of sports clothes. She will distribute these to wholesalers in the municipality of Rionegro, Colombia. She is sure that this will be the start of building a large business from which she hopes many female heads of household will benefit, giving them the opportunity to work and generate income.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
En la cálida ciudad de Ica caracteriza también por el desarrollo de su agricultura en especial por el cultivo de uva, esparrago, entre otros; Es así que en esta ciudad vive Celia, una mujer con un carisma contagiante, con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera encantado poder estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Día a día Celia trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza y también venta de Pisco y vino, ella trabaja alrededor 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 10 clientes diariamente; Celia nos comenta que está saliendo adelante con su negocio porque ofrece productos a precios cómodos y de buena calidad, además de su amabilidad con los clientes.

Celia está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más productos para ofrecer en su negocio como Pisco y vino en porrones, de esta manera podrá tener mayor variedad de productos en su negocio y así mejorar sus ingresos y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
The warm city of Ica is characterized by its agriculture, especially for the harvest of grapes and asparagus, among others. For that reason, Celia lives here. She is a woman with a contagious charisma and has a strong desire to get ahead.  Due to her limited economic resources, she was only able to study until the fifth year of secondary school.  She would have loved to be able to study for a university degree.

Day after day Celia works at her small business selling beauty products and also Pisco(grape brandy) and wine.  She works around eight hours a day and can serve up to 10 customers a day.  Celia tells us that she is getting ahead with her business because she offers products of good quality at reasonable prices, and because of her friendliness with customers.

Celia is very grateful for Kiva’s lenders.  Thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able buy more products for her business to offer, like Pisco and jugs of wine.  This way she will be able to have a bigger variety of products in her business, increase her income, and strive to make her biggest dream a reality: Having her own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (Pisco and wine)

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor de 56 años de edad es un hombre que ha luchado por sacar adelante a su familia, por ello trabaja incesantemente para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. Laboró durante varios años administrando una panadería. Después de aprender el oficio decidió independizarse y montar su propio negocio de panificación. Esta actividad le ha permitido garantizarles a sus dos hijos una educación y mejores oportunidades de vida.

Su mayor sueño es poder adecuar su negocio con el fin de ofrecer un mejor servicio e incrementar su volumen de ventas. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que comprará tres juegos de mesas, silletería y un aviso laminoso.
texts.en: Víctor is a 56-year-old man who has fought to make headway for his family by working incessantly to offer them a better quality of life. He has worked for a number of years running a bakery. After learning the trade he decided to go out on his own and start his own business. This activity has allowed him to guarantee his children's education and opportunities for a better life. His biggest dream is to be able to adjust his business so it can offer a better service and increase his sales volume. For this reason, he is requesting the loan to purchase three sets of tables and chairs and a laminated sign.

loans.use: to purchase three sets of tables and chairs, and a laminated sign.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise (pots, knives, spoons, glasses, blankets, decorative items, and others).

loans.name: Jessica Martina

texts.es:
Jessica tiene 43 años y desde muy joven trabaja muy duro para poder salir adelante, sobre todo porque es madre de 2 hijos de 24 y 16 años, a quienes ha sacado adelante sola ya que es madre soltera y a pesar de las adversidades ha podido surgir y ser un ejemplo para sus hijos. Jessica no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria debido a sus pocos recursos económicos pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de enfermería.

Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro logro iniciar su negocio de venta de carteras y perfumes, ella trabaja en su negocio alrededor de 9 horas al día y puede atender hasta 12 clientes diariamente; ella cree que está saliendo adelante en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y ofrece productos bonitos y llamativos.

Jessica está muy agradecida con la gran ayuda que le han brindado los prestatarios Kiva podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como carteras de verano, perfumes, billeteras, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y poder atender mejor a sus clientes, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un local propio y ser una gran empresaria”.
texts.en:
Jessia is 43 years old.  Ever since she was very young she has worked very hard to get ahead, especially because she is a mother of 2 children aged 24 and 16.  She has provided for them on her own, since she is a single mother. She's been able to rise above the adversities she's faced and be an example to her children.  Jessica was not able to get a university degree due to a lack of financial resources, but she would have liked to have studied to become a nurse.

With a lot of effort and saving, she started her own business selling purses and perfumes.  She works about 9 hours a day in her business, and she is able to serve about 12 customers a day.  She believes that she is getting ahead with her business because she is very friendly with her customers, and offers beautiful and eye-catching products.

Jessica is very grateful for the great help that the Kiva lenders are providing her.  She will buy merchandise for her business such as summer purses, perfumes, wallets, and other items.  In this way, she will be able to have a greater variety of products and provide better service to her customers.  Jessica will continue to strive to make her greatest dream a reality: "To have my own store and to become a great businesswoman."

loans.use: to buy perfumes, wallets, purses and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials such as wood and corrugated metal sheeting, among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her home.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS ANGELES,este banco esta ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Marleni tiene 35 años de edad ,03 hijos y es casada;la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos naturales,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria repartiendo su mercaderia a sus clientes que mas le solicitan,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de productos naturales para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the LOS ANGELES Communal Bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The partner Marleni is 35 years old, has 3 children and is married. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling natural products. The partner has had this business for years, and it is going well thanks to the efforts that she puts into her business each day. The partner sells in an itinerant manner, distributing her merchandise to her best clients. The partner is a responsible and dedicated person as this is how she helps her family get ahead.

The partner asks for the loan to buy natural products for her business.

The partner feels thankful for the loan granted and is committed to meeting her established quotas.

loans.use: to buy natural products for her business.

loans.name: Yuri

texts.es:
La socia pertence al banco comunal LOS ANGELES,la socia continua con su negocio de taller mecanico ,la socia apoya a su conyugue en el negocio que ambos tiene en la area de logistica,la socia lleva años con este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de lubricantes y aceites para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to Los Angeles Communal Bank.  She continues with her auto repair shop.  She helps her husband with the logistics in the business they own together.  She has been in this business for years and it's going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day, this being how she gets her family ahead.

She's requesting the loan to buy lubricants and oil for her business.

She's grateful for the loan granted and pledges to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy lubricants and oil

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal   ”LOS ANGELES”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de frutas,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende de forma independiente en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su famiia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de fruta para su negocio como platanos,naranjas entre otros.


La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
