texts.en: This is a member of the communal bank "Los Angeles" located in the Huanchac district, province and department of Cusco. She continues with her business selling fruits. She has had the business a number of years and it is going well thanks to the hard work she puts in every day. She is an independent seller in one of the markets in Cusco, and in this way she makes headway for her family. She is requesting the loan to buy fruits like bananas and oranges, among others. She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to purchase fruit like bananas and oranges.

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal LOS ANGELES, este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Sebastiana  tiene 33 años de edad ,02 hijos y es casada; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de frutas, la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia vende de forma ambulatoria a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia a la vez tiene otro negocio de venta de anticuchos, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de fruta para su negocio como naranjas, plátanos entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to Los Angeles Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco in the province and department of Cusco.  Sebastiana, 32, is married and has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling fruit.  She sells in one of the markets in the city of Cusco.  She sells on foot to the customers who buy from her.  She also has a business selling "anticuchos" [grilled heart and beef].  This is how she gets her family ahead.

She's requesting the loan to buy oranges, bananas, and other fruit for her business.

She's grateful for the loan granted and pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy oranges, bananas, and other fruit

loans.name: Virgen De Las Nieves Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Julissa ella es soltera y tiene 36 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de zapatos y zapatillas para niños, varones y mujeres, ella vende en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares donde vende zapatos zapatillas, la socia trae la mercadería de diferentes lugares, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta preparar tortas, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las zapatillas y zapatos. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos y zapatillas.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo despues la foto porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de ropa y negocio de venta de comida.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to Virgen de las Nieves Communal Bank, located in the district of Cusco in the province and department of Cusco.  The member, Julissa, is 36 years old and single.  She works in her business selling shoes and slippers for men, women, and children.  She sells independently, going to different places to sell.  She gets the merchandise from various places.  She works from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. She has been in the business for four years already and it's going very well for her.  In her free time she likes to make cakes.  Her dream is to have a place where she can sell slippers and shoes.

She's requesting the loan to buy shoes and slippers.                                                                                                                                                                                 

The member who's attached to the group photo asked permission for her photo to be taken later because of work.

The other members make a living selling crafts, groceries, clothing, and food.

She's grateful to those who are part of this dream and pledges to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy shoes and slippers

loans.name: Esperanza Y Progreso Group

texts.es:
Este es el Grupo “Esperanza y Progreso” conforman 05 mujeres emprendedoras que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 27. Martha tiene 57 años, casada y con 05 hijos. Martha se dedica desde hace 2 años a la venta de ropa nueva, cuenta con clientes fidelizados. Martha solicitó el préstamo para la compra de polos, bibiri, short, pantalón, faldas. Su sueño es de terminar de construir su casa. Martha está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Martha es la primera del lado izquierdo viste polo celeste.
* La señora Esther aparece en la foto pequeña al lado superior derecho.
texts.en:
The communal bank  “Esperanza y Progreso” (Hope and Progress) has five enterprising members who have different businesses and are now in their 27th loan cycle. Martha, 57, is married and has five children. For two years, she has sold new clothing and has loyal customers. She is applying for a loan to buy polo shirts, t shirts, shorts, pants, and skirts. Her dream is to finish building her house. Martha is pleased to have the loan and thankful to Kiva. She is the first person on the left and is wearing a light blue t shirt.

Sra. Esther appears in the photo in the upper right hand corner.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, t shirts, shorts, pants, and skirts.

loans.name: Primero De Enero  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Primero de Enero es un banco comunal que se encuentra constituido por 9 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por una misma comunidad, todos son amigos de un sector de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de hermosos paisajes debido a su geografía accidentada, su centro parroquial es una mezcla de la arquitectura moderna y la antigua. La parroquia del Valle tiene un gran progreso ya que tiene un gran movimiento comercial, su gente se dedica a la agricultura y comercio, son personas amables, gentiles que aun mantienen vivas las llamas de su cultura y tradiciones.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Nube, vive por el sector de Castilla Cruz perteneciente a la parroquia del Valle, este es su primer crédito en el banco comunal Primero de Enero al cual fue invitada por sus amigas del sector. 

La Señora María Nube tiene 43 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos, una hija es casada y vive independiente y su hijo soltero trabaja y le ayuda  económicamente. Su esposo trabaja como empleado privado, la casa en la que viven es el fruto del trabajo conyugal.
 
Doña María se dedica venta ambulante de ropa, esta actividad la realiza puerta a puerta, vende a sus amigas y conocidas, esta actividad la desempeña hace 2 años, trabaja de lunes a viernes sin un horario fijo.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para seguir creciendo en su negocio.
 
Su meta es terminar su casa ya que aun le hacen falta algunos acabados.
texts.en:
"Primero de Enero" (1st January) is a communal bank which is made up of 9 female members and 1 male member who all live in the same community. They are all friends from the Valle parish in Cuenca, a place that is surrounded by beautiful landscapes thanks to its hilly geography. The centre of the parish contains a mixture of old and new architecture. The Valle parish is doing well as there has been a big commercial surge with people dedicating themselves to agriculture and business. The people there are kind and friendly and still keep the old flames of their culture and traditions alive.

One of the members is María Nube who lives in the Castilla Cruz area which belongs to the Valle parish. This is her first loan with the "Primero de Enero" communal bank which she was invited to join by a friend. María Nube is 43 years old and married with 2 children. The daughter is married and lives independently and her son is single and he works and supports them financially. 

Her husband works in a private company. The house that they live in is the fruit of their work together. María has been selling clothes door to door to her friends and acquaintances for 2 years. She works from Mondays to Fridays with no fixed hours. She will invest the new loan in buying clothes to continue building the business. Her aim is to finish her house as there are still a few things that it needs.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Fuafiva

texts.en:
Fuafiva is 23 years old and married with no children. 

Fuafiva has a small garden where she grows taro, tomatoes, beans, and taamu (giant taro) that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

Fuafiva needs a loan to buy more equipment for her business. She will use the profits from her sales to extend her business and support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives, spade, etc.

loans.name: Family  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Family se encuentra conformado por 8 socias y 1 socio quienes viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que por su geografía accidentada tiene hermosos paisajes para disfrutar, esta ciudad es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza y relajarse en familia. Su gente son personas amables, gentiles y luchadoras que trabajan día a día para mejorar su situación económica y llegar a tener un mejor futuro con sus familias, su orgullo es de aun mantener su cultura y tradiciones.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Yoni, se encuentra realizando un re préstamo con el banco comunal Family, es una socia que tienen un buen sentido del humor, es luchadora y trabajadora siempre se encuentra en la búsqueda de la superación personal y familiar, nos comenta que se encuentra gozando de muy buena salud al igual que todos los miembros de su familia.

La Señora. Yoni, tiene 32 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 12 y 7 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en el colegio y su segunda hija está en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña Yoni labora en diferentes actividades las que le permiten solventar algunos de los gastos de su hogar, se dedica al arreglo de casas y también labora en la venta de ropa, estas actividades le dan el tiempo necesario para poder cuidar de su casa. 

Su crédito anterior lo ha invirtió en la compra de ropa, las ganancias que obtuvo fueron de mucha ayuda para su familia. Su nuevo crédito también lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para seguir creciendo en esta actividad. La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo y la solidaridad del grupo.
texts.en:
The Family communal bank is composed of 8 female members and one male member who live in different parts of the city of Cuenca. Because of its rugged geography, Cuenca is a city that has beautiful landscapes to enjoy and is a UN Cultural Heritage site as of December, 1999. It has various places to enjoy nature and to relax with your family. Its people are friendly, gentle and fighters who work every day to improve their economic situation and to obtain a better future with their families. Their pride is in continuing to maintain their culture and traditions.

One of the members of this group is Yoni who is seeking a successive loan with the communal family bank. She is a member that has a good sense of humor, is a fighter and a hard worker who can always be found seeking to better herself personally and her family. She told us that she is enjoying good health, as are all of the members of her family. 

Yoni is 32 years old, is married, and the fruit of this marital union is two children who are 12 and 7 years old. Her oldest son studies in high school and her younger daughter is in a small school in the city. Her husband works as a private employee. They do not have their own home and because of this they rent. 

Yoni works in different activities that allow her to pay for some of the household expenses. She works fixing up homes and also works selling clothes. These activities give her the time necessary to be able to care for her home. 

She invested her previous loan in the purchase of clothes. The earnings that she obtained were very helpful for her family. She will also invest her new loan in the purchase of clothing to be able to continue growing this activity. The communal bank likes her for her comradery and the solidarity of the group.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Nubia Isabel

texts.es: Doña Nubia lleva muchos años con su propio negocio de abarrotes y venta de tropigas, los créditos los ha invertido en este negocio, ahora hará lo mismo comprara granos básicos, carnes, lácteos, sazonadores y gas para mantener siempre con productos la venta, su vecino le ha ayudado a salir adelante ya que con su problema de sobre peso no puede trabajar o movilizarse mucho, sus clientes la quieren mucho, recibe el apoyo de sus hijos quienes trabajan por cuenta propia, los planes futuros de doña Nubia es poner un comedor y una casa hogar para ayudar a los niños de la calle y cuidarlos con todo el amor de una madre.
texts.en: Nubia, has owned her business for many years selling groceries and propane.  She has invested the loans that she has taken in her business.  Now she will do the same, buying staple grains, meat, dairy products, seasonings, and propane gas, so that she will always have products on hand to sell.  Her neighbor has helped her to get ahead, because with her weight problem she finds it difficult to work or get around very much.  Her customers really love her, and her children, who work on their own, support her.  In the future, Nubia plans to establish a dining area and shelter for street children, and care for them with all  the love of a mothe

loans.use: to buy staple grains, meat, dairy products, seasonings, and propane gas

loans.name: Severino

texts.es:
El señor Severino tiene 66 años, hace varios años que se quedó viudo, desde entonces vive solo con sus nietos, el señor Severino es una persona sencilla, humilde, de escasos recursos económicos  y muy trabajador, desde aquella vez que se quedó viudo trabajo duro para sobrevivir, vive en una pequeña casa de adobe, su principal actividad es la producción de la leche cruda, cuyo producto entrega a una empresa que se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos.
El destino del crédito es para la compra de una ordeñadora, esto le ayudara mucho porque el señor Severino es de una edad avanzada y casi ya no tiene fuerzas para ordeñar a mano. El señor Severino nos comenta que tiene que seguir trabajando para sobrevivir, a pesar que tiene un hijo y vive con el no le ayuda para los gastos de la casa. 
El señor Severino  quiere hacer realidad sus sueños y metas que es de incrementar el ganado y dejarles como herencia a sus 2 nietos.
texts.en:
Severino is 66 years old.  It has been several years since he was widowed and since then he has lived alone with his grandchildren.  Severino is a simple, humble person of limited economic resources and is very hard-working.  Since the time that he was widowed he has worked hard to survive.  He lives in a small adobe house.  His main activity is the production of raw milk which is delivered to a company that is dedicated to the production of dairy products.  

The purpose of the loan is for the purchase of a milking machine.  This will help him a lot because Severino is of an advanced age and almost no longer has the strength to milk by hand.  Severino says that he has to continue working in order to survive.  In spite of the fact that he has a son and lives with him, he doesn’t help with the household expenses.

Severino wants to make his dreams and goals a reality, which are to increase the livestock and leave them as an inheritance to his two grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase a milking machine.

loans.name: Virgen Asunta De Huanoquite Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN ASUNTA DE HUANOQUITE”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Adriel  es soltero y tiene 22 años ; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, el socio vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azúcar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas  entre otros, el socio lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio a la vez esta estudiando en una academia pre universitaria para postular a la carrera profesional de administración, siendo de esta forma que el socio sale adelante.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como arroz y azúcar.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la agricultura, venta de productos agropecuarios, guía de turismo, venta de granos secos, venta de carteras, venta de leña.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “VIRGEN ASUNTA DE HUANOQUITE”.  This bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco in the region of Cusco.  

The featured borrower is Adriel.  He is single and is twenty-two years old.  He alternates his daily activities between tasks in his grocery store business.  He sells different types of products, like rice, sugar, milk, candies, carbonated beverages, and other items.  He has been in this business for some time and it is going well thanks to the determination he brings to his business each day.

At the same time, this member is studying at a pre-university academy in order to apply for professional courses in administration, feeling that in this way, he can move himself forward.

He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for his business, like rice and sugar.

The other group members make a living in agriculture, selling livestock products, being a tourism guide, dried grains sales, selling wallets, and selling firewood.

He gives thanks to those that form part of his dream through this medium, and he promises to comply with the payments within the prescribed time period.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his business, like rice and sugar.

loans.name: María Lourdes

texts.es:
La Señora. María es una socia que realiza hace 3 años créditos en la banca comunal, ha estado en algunos bancos comunales en donde ha formado grandes amistades y ahora se socia del banco comunal Las Gaviotas, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Baños que se encuentra a ocho kilómetros al oeste de Cuenca, a 15 minutos del centro histórico de la ciudad. Las propiedades curativas de las vertientes termales que salen desde las montañas adyacentes hicieron de Baños un próspero centro turístico, además de su gastronomía y sus varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, de un corazón cálido y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

La Señora María tiene 47 años de edad, es una mujer soltera no tiene hijos, vive con su madre a quien cuida ya que tiene una avanzada edad, la casa en la que vive es de su mamá. 
Doña María labora a diario en la venta ambulante de granos, verduras y hortalizas ya que no tiene un puesto propio para vender sus productos, esta actividad la realiza hace 20 años. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de verduras y hortalizas para continuar en su negocio. 

Su meta es tener un puesto propio y así vender de mejor manera su producto.
texts.en:
Maria is a member who has been receiving loans through her communal bank for 3 years. She has belonged to other communal banks where she has formed grand friendships and now, she is associated with Las Gaviotas (The Seagulls) communal bank. She lives on the outskirts of Banos (Baths) parish, some 8 kilometers west of Cuenca, or 15 minutes from the city's historical center. The curative properties of the thermal springs that emerge from the adjacent mountains have allowed Banos to prosper as a tourist center.  Its also known for its gastronomy and its various places to enjoy nature. the local people are kind and warm hearted, and they maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

Maria is 47 years old and single with no children. She lives with her mother whom she cares for due to advanced age. The house they live in belongs to her mother. 

Maria works daily selling grains, vegetables, and garden produce in the streets. She lacks a stall of her own where she could sell her products. Maria has done this for some 20 years.

Her new loan will be invested in purchasing vegetables and garden produce to continue her business.

Maria's goal is to have her own stall where she can sell her products in a better manner.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and garden produce to sell.

loans.name: María Delia

texts.es:
La Señora María es una socia luchadora que siempre busca salir en adelante, se encuentra realizando su cuarto crédito en la banca comunal Las Gaviotas, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Baños en Cuenca. Las propiedades curativas de las vertientes termales que salen desde las montañas adyacentes hicieron de Baños un próspero centro turístico, además de su gastronomía y sus varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, de un corazón cálido y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 

Doña María tiene 40 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos, tres de sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, su hijo soltero estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en el área de la construcción ya que labora como albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 

La Señora María pasa en casa al cuidado de su hogar pero la  mayor parte de su tiempo se dedica a tejer y vender canastas, esta actividad la aprendió desde muy pequeña con el ejemplo  de sus padres, es así como ella aporta a la economía de su hogar. 

Su nuevo crédito es para comprar carrizo para la elaboración de sus canastas. 

Su meta es  tener su casa propia.,
texts.en:
María is a fighting member that is always looking to move forward.  This is her fourth loan with the communal bank Las Gaviotas [The Seagulls].  She lives in the surrounding area of the Baños parish, which is eight kilometers west of Cuenca, or about fifteen minutes from the historic center of the city.  The healing properties of the thermal springs that come from the adjacent mountains made Baños a prosperous center of tourism.  Furthermore, there is great food and various places to enjoy nature.  The people are kind and warm-hearted, and still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

She is forty years old, is married, and in her marriage, has conceived four children.  Three of her children work and help her economically.  Her single (unmarried) son studies at a high school in the city.  Her husband works in construction as a bricklayer.  They do not have their own house so they lease their home.

María spends time in the house taking care of her home, but the greater part of her time is dedicated to weaving and selling baskets.  She learned this trade when she was very young from the example of her parents.  In this way, she contributes to the economy of her home.

Her new loan is to buy reeds for the production of her baskets.  

Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy reeds.

loans.name: Clara Inela

texts.es:
La Señora. Clara se encuentra hace 2 años en el banco comunal Las Gaviotas, es una mujer amable, gentil y luchadoras, a quien le gusta el banco comunal por la amistad y el compañerismo que existe en el grupo, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Baños que se encuentra a ocho kilómetros, al oeste de Cuenca, a 15 minutos del centro histórico de la ciudad. Las propiedades curativas de las vertientes termales que salen desde las montañas adyacentes hicieron de Baños un próspero centro turístico, además de su gastronomía y sus varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente es amable, de un corazón cálido y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Clara tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera de 5 hijos, tres de sus hijos son casados y viven independientes, sus dos últimos hijos estudian uno en el colegio y el otro en una escuela de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Clara es una mujer emprendedora ya que ha sacado a sus hijos adelante con su sacrificio y trabajo, se dedica a laborar en un consultorio médico como asistente, esta actividad la realiza hace algunos años. También se dedica a la venta cosméticos de varias marcas. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos para continuar creciendo en este negocio.
 
Su meta es estudiar belleza y tener su propio gabinete.
texts.en:
Clara has been at "Las Gaviotas" (The Seagulls) communal bank for 2 years. She is a friendly, kind and determined woman who likes the communal bank because of the friendship and support that exists in the group. She lives on the outskirts of the Baños parish which can be found eight kilometres to the west of Cuenca, 15 minutes from the historic centre of the city.

The healing properties of the thermal springs that come out of the adjacent mountains have made Baños a prosperous tourist centre. Other attractions include the local food, the various places where nature can be enjoyed, and the kind warm-hearted people who still maintain the traditions and culture of the towns.

Clara is 49 years old and is a single mother of 5. Three of her sons are married and live independently. Her youngest two sons study: one in a high school and the other in a school in the city. They don't have their own house and so rent.

Clara is an entrepreneurial woman proved by the fact that she has got her children ahead with sacrifice and hard work. She has worked as a medical consultant's assistant for many years. She also sells various makes of cosmetics. She is going to invest the loan in buying cosmetics to continue building her business. Her aim is to study beauty and have her own salon.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es:
La señora Georgina,sigue con su negocio de preparacion de bocaditos,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia prepara estos bocaditos para los distintos compromisos que le solicitan como matrimonios,bautizos,fiesta de 15 años entre otros,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos como harina,mantequilla,azucar entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Georgina continues with her business of making snacks.  She has been in this business for years.  It is going very well for her thanks to the determination she puts into the business every day.  She makes these snacks upon requests for different occasions like weddings, baptisms, 15th birthday celebrations, and others.  This is the way she gets her family ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies like flour, butter, and sugar, among others.

She is grateful for the loan that was granted, and she pledges to make her scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like flour, butter, and sugar, among others.

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Ofelia; La socia pertenece al banco comunal NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA II,la socia sigue con su negocio  de compra y venta de articulos de bazar, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende diferentes productos como peluches,adornos entre otros,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como peluches y juguetes entre otros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower is Ofelia. She belongs to the "Nueva Luz del Mañana" communal bank, and is continuing with her business buying and selling gift items. She has been in this business for years, and it is going well thanks to the effort she devotes to it each day. 

She sells various products such as stuffed animals, ornaments and other things, as this the way she is raising her family. The borrower is applying for the loan to buy merchandise such as stuffed animals, toys, and other items. 

She feels grateful for the loan granted, and promises to make the agreed installment payments.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as stuffed animals, toys and other items.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio sigue dedicandose a brindar el servicio de transporte en el sector turismo,el socio lleva buen tiempo en esta actividad el cual le va biengracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio a la vez apoya a su conyugue en el negocio de compra y venta de gallinas y pollos ,el socio es una persona responable siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.

El socio solicita el credito para la compra de llantas para su carro.
texts.en:
This member continues to make a living offering a transportation service in the tourism sector.  He has been working in this activity for a while, and everything is going well thanks to the determination he brings to his business each day. 

He also supports his spouse in her business of buying and selling hens and chickens.  He is a responsible person and feels that in being this way, he will be able to move his family ahead.

He is requesting a loan to buy tires for his car.

loans.use: to buy tires for his car.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La señora Mercedes, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA”,la socia continua con su negocio de hospedaje,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio ,la socia se siente feliz con su negocio ya que le trae satisfaciones tanto economicas como personales,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de sabanas y colchas para su negocio.
La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mercedes belongs to the communal bank Nueva Luz del Mañana. 

She continues in the lodging business. She has spent years in this business and it is doing well thanks to the effort she puts in each day to the business. She feels happy with her business because it brings satisfaction both financial as well as personal. This is the way she supports the family.

She is asking for a loan to buy sheets and bedspreads for her business.

The borrower is grateful for the opportunity given to her through this means and furthermore she promises to complete her payments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy sheets and bedspreads for her business.

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
La socia Yoni sigue con su negocio de compra y venta de animales menores como pollos y gallinas,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que mas le solicitan,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de gallinas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Member Yoni still has her business buying and selling small animals, such as chickens and hens.  She has had the business for years and it is going well, thanks to the huge effort she puts in every day.  Yoni raises the animals to sell on to her customers.  This is how she is helping her family prosper.

Yoni is applying for this loan to buy hens for her business.

loans.use: to buy hens for her business.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Los Girasoles” que conforman 10 mujeres emprendedoras que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 25. Norma tiene 31 años, conviviente con 04 hijos la cual 03 de ellos en etapa escolar. Norma se dedica desde hace 2 años al tejido, teje a pedido chompas, chalecos. Norma solicito el préstamo para la compra de lanas, hilos, agujas. El sueño de Norma es de crecer más su negocio. Norma se encuentra en la parte de adelante es la primera del lado izquierdo, viste polo blanco con rayas negras y pantalón negro.
texts.en:
This group is called Los Girasoles (The Sunflowers). It is made up of 10 women entrepreneurs who work in various business activities and they are in their 25th loan cycle.

Norma is 31 years old, living with her partner and four children of which three are of school age. Norma has been weaving for two years, taking orders for sweaters and vests.

Norma is asking for a loan to buy wool, thread, and needles.

Norma’s dream is to expand her business. 

Norma can be found at the front. She is the first on the left side, wearing a white polo shirt with black stripes and black pants.

loans.use: to buy wool, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Yndira

texts.es:
La señora Yndira, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA”,la socia continua dedicandose al negocio de elaboracion de tejidos como chompas,chalinas entre otros,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia trabaja de forma independiente repartiendo su mercaderia  a sus clientes que le solicitan,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de lana,tejedores entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Yndira belongs to the "NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA” communal bank, this member continues to make her living making woven goods such as jumpers, scarves and so on. Yndira has spent many years in this business which is going well for her thanks to the effort she injects into her business every day. She works independently distributing her merchandise to her customers, and this is the way in which Yndira get her family ahead in life.

Yndira is seeking this loan to buy wool, looms and more. She is grateful for the loan that she has been awarded and pledges to meet the fixed repayments.

loans.use: to buy wool, looms and more.

loans.name: Nohemi Rosalia

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Nohemi,la socia sigue con su negocio de venta de materiales de construccion ,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de cemento,arena entre otros para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The borrower, Nohemi, continues working selling construction supplies. She has been in this business for years and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in each day to her business. She is a responsible person and this is the way she supports her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy cement, sand and other items for her business.

She is grateful for the approved loan and she promises to complete her payment according to the established plan.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Ani Roxana

texts.es:
La señora Ani Roxana, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA”,la socia continua con su negocio de crianza de animales menores como gallinas y pollos,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia trabaja con sus padres en este negocio siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de gallinas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Ani Roxana belongs to the "Nueva Luz del Mañana" ["New Light of the Morning"] communal bank. This member continues in her business of raising young animals like hens and chicks. She raises these animals to later sell them to her customers who request them. She works with her parents in this business, which is the how she provides for her family.

The member is requesting the loan for the purchase of hens for her business.

loans.use: to purchase hens for her business.

loans.name: Sokhim

texts.en:
Originally from a village of the Prey Chhor district where rice farming is a common way to make a living, Sokhim is a 42-year-old mother of five children, three of whom are still in school while the others are too young. Farming is the main source of the family’s income. She has been in this business for 24 years. Her husband supplements their income by making palm juice. The current business earns her about 30,000 KHR per day and allows her to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses.

This is the second microloan for Sokhim with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and she completely paid back her first loan. Sokhim successfully used the first loan to relieve her family’s burden and improve their livelihood. Now she is applying for a new loan of 1,000,000 KHR to buy fertilizer for her farmland, and she will use a portion of it to spend on gasoline for water pumping. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow her rice successfully so as to increase her income to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Na's Group

texts.en:
Na, age 48, is married with three dependent children, two of whom are still in school. Her family lives in a house with a thatch roof located in Battambang province’s Moung Russey district. The main source of her family’s income is farming rice on 1.5-hectare of farmland. She has been running her business for ten years, earning about KHR 20,000 per day and saving about KHR 12,000 each day.

Na received her first loan from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, three cycles ago and effectively used it to sustain her family’s business and support their needs. She is leading her group of two to apply for another loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. Na hopes to get a high yield from her farming business  in order to improve her standard of living and fulfill her dream to buy a plot of farmland to expand her paddy-field business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Hok's Group

texts.en:
Hok, age 62, is married and lives with her family in a village of the Ek Phnom district. She has three children. To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice, planting beans and raising cows for 40 years. The current business earns her family about 46,000 KHR per day but she can manage to save about 13,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

Hok has been with Kiva's partner, VisionFund, for five loan cycles while the other member has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Hok completely paid back her previous loans which helped her to relieve her farmland’s burden. Now she is leading her group of two to ask for another loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides for her plantation business. She hopes to increase her family’s income so as to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and pesticides for her plantation business

loans.name: Aisas' Group

texts.en:
Aisas is 30 years old and married with four children. Her family lives in a village of the Sangke district in Battambang province, and she and her husband earn a living through fishing. To supplement their income, her husband also works as a paid worker in the local area. The current business earns her family about 20,000 KHR per day and her family manages to save about 8,000 KHR per day after daily expenses.

Aisas has been with Kiva's partner, VisionFund, for five loan cycles while the other member is just joining VisionFund this cycle. Aisas' past loans have helped relieve her family's financial burden to a great extent. She is now leading a group of two members to apply for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy a boat for her fishing business. She hopes to catch more fish so as to sell them for a good price and make a better living.

loans.use: to buy a boat for her fishing business

loans.name: Phakdey

texts.en:
Phakdey is a villager from a rural area located in the Kampong Cham province’s Ou Reang Ov district. She is 29 years old and married with two children, both of whom are still in school. She earns a living through farming rice and planting cassava on 3 hectares of farmland. Having been in this business for nine years, she is able to earn about 40,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

This is the second loan for Phakdey from Kiva's partner, VisionFund. She completely paid back the previous loan which helped her to better support her family with enough food. Now she is asking for a loan of 2,000,000 KHR to pay for labor costs in harvesting rice and she will use a portion of it to buy a plot of farmland and expand her business. She hopes to get a high yield from her plantation business so as to make a living better and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to pay labor costs for harvesting rice

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Savang's Group

texts.en:
Living in a wooden house with her family members in a rural village of the Prey Chhor district, Savang 34 years old and married with four children, two of whom are still in school. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice and working for others for a fee. Having now been in this business for 15 years, she is able to earn about 20,000 KHR per day and manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

Savang’s group consists of four members who have been with Kiva's partner, VisionFund. for two cycles. The past loans which Savang completely paid back have helped better support her family’s burden. Now she is leading her group to ask for a new loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice healthfully and fruitfully so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Sinoun's Group

texts.en:
Sinoun lives in a rural area of the Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province. She is 42 years old and married with three children, all of whom are dependent on her and still in school. To support her family, she has been growing rice and beans for almost 20 years. Her current business earns her about 26,000 KHR per day and she manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

Sinoun’s group consists of two members who have been with Kiva's partner, VisionFund, for two cycles. Now she is leading her group to request another loan of 1,400,000 KHR to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland, and she will use a portion of it to spend on labor costs. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her daily income so as to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Bondol

texts.en:
Bondol lives in a rural village located in the Sa Ang district’s Kandal province. He is 31 years old and married with two children, both of whom are dependent on him and still in school. To earn a living, he has been planting banana trees for 11 years. His wife also supplements their income by selling rice in the local area. His current business earns his family about US$17 per day and his family manages to save about US$7 each day after daily expenses. 

Bondol has been a member of Kiva's partner, VisionFund, for two loan cycles already and he completely paid back the previous loans, which enabled him to better support his current business as well as his children’s education. Now he is applying for a loan to buy more banana trees for planting, and he will use a portion of it to spend on renovating their old house. He hopes this loan will enable him to earn more income from his current business so as to make a better living and keep his children in school.

loans.use: To buy more banana tree for planting

loans.name: Sokheang

texts.en:
A 19-year-old mother of one daughter, Sokheang resides in a rural village of the Pursat province’s Sampov Meas district in Cambodia. To support her living, she has been farming rice while her husband supplements their income by working for others for a fee. Together, they can earn about KHR 30,000 per day and can save about KHR 15,000 per day for future needs.
  
This is the second loan for Sokheang from Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She completely paid back the previous loan which helped her to better support her current business. Now she is asking for a new loan of KHR 1,600,000 to buy a buffalo to help her in the paddy fields. She hopes to increase her family’s business so as to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy a buffalo to help her in the paddy fields

loans.name: Nang

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural area of the Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chor district, Nang is a 33-year-old married mother of three children. To support her family, she and her husband have been involved in farming rice for several years. The current business earns her family about 30,000 KHR per day. She manages to save about 10,000 KHR each day after daily expenses. 

This is the first microloan for Nang with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. Now she is asking for a loan of 4,000,000 KHR to buy rice seed for her farmland and to renovate her old house. She hopes this loan will enable her to get a high yield from her rice paddy and have a proper house to live in.

loans.use: To buy rice seed for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Vivian

texts.es: La señora Vivian  trabajo desde muy joven, se concubino a corta edad, antes trabajaba como artesana  en la que elaboraba artesanías en hoja de plátano y corcho , esta actividad no resultó muy lucrativa por que los grupos de artesanos no se organizaron, esto perjudico la funcionalidad de la microempresa, después llegó a trabajar con la venta de comida por unos años, dejó esta actividad porque tuvo un embarazo delicado, en los últimos años nuevamente inicio con los servicios de restaurante y expendio de bebidas alcohólicas en un bar restaurant, ubicado en el domicilio actual en el que vive. El destino del crédito es compra de una heladera y enseres para ampliación de su restaurante y así podrá mejorar sus ingresos económicos para su familia.
texts.en: Vivian began working and became a common-law wife at an early age. Previously she made handicrafts from plantain leaves and cork, but the work was not profitable because the artisans were not organized. This undermined her micro business. Later, she sold prepared food for a few years, but she gave this up because she had a difficult pregnancy. A few years ago, she started her restaurant business again in her house and added a bar offering alcoholic drinks. She will use the loan to buy a freezer and furnishings to expand her restaurant so that she can earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and furnishings.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El Señor Juan  es Chofer, cariñoso padre y abuelito. Don Juan, realiza su actividad laboral dentro del transporte urbano de pasajeros, todos los días cumple un horario de trabajo, a pesar que él es su propio jefe, trabaja desde las 8:00 de la mañana, para poder ir a almorzar junto a su familia a medio día, y posteriormente retornar a las calles conduciendo su vehículo que es su principal herramienta de trabajo, la cual le permite generar sus ingresos día a día. El vive con su madre, su hija y 2 nietos pequeños, su hija es quien atiende todo lo relacionado a la casa, y Don Juan es la figura paterna para sus nietos. Con el día a día el vehículo tiene algún desgaste en el motor, por lo que necesita el crédito para poder comprar otro y además cambiar las llantas. Don Juan está seguro que con este cambio su vehículo podrá acompañarlo por muchos años más, para así tener un ingreso seguro todos los días lo cual le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su casa.
texts.en: Juan is a driver, loving father, and grandfather. Juan offers taxi service around the city and works daily. While he may be his own boss, he works from 8:00 in the morning so that he can have lunch with his family, and then he goes back to driving the car which is the basis of his job and lets him earn income each day. He lives with his mother, two small grandchildren, and his daughter, who takes care of the house. He is the father figure for his grandchildren. His engine is showing wear and tear, and he will use this loan to buy another and to change the tires. Juan is certain that his car will last for many more years with these repairs and that he will have a secure income with which to support his family.

loans.use: to buy an engine and wheels.

loans.name: Grabiel

texts.es: El cliente, Grabiel, es un señor de  25 años de edad, está casado con la señora Rocío Roxana, trabaja en una empresa de distribuidora de bebidas a elección, donde la empresa queda a 10 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, actualmente el cliente vive por la zona oeste de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  la casa donde vive el señor Grabiel es de sus suegros, el cliente vive con su esposa y sus hijos. El necesita un crédito para la compra de mercadería, (bebidas para la venta), con esto quiere mejorar sus ingresos actuales, que por ahora son muy bajos, el sueña con dar mejores condiciones a su familia y satisfacer las necesidades.
texts.en: Grabiel, 25, is married to Rocío Roxana.  He works for a beverage distribution firm that’s located ten kilometers from the city of Cochabamba.  He currently lives in the western part of Cochabamba.  The house he lives in is his in-laws’ and he lives there with his wife and children.  He needs a loan to buy merchandise (beverages to sell) to improve his current income that’s currently too low.  He dreams with giving his family better conditions and meeting their needs.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Maria Salome

texts.es:
La señora Maria Salome, pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA”,la socia continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocico el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de gaseosas para su negocio.

La socia se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Salome is part of the "Nueva Luz del Mañana" communal bank. She still has her small grocery store in which she sells different types of products, such as rice, sugar, milk, candy and soft drinks, among others. She has been working in her business for a while now and it is successful because of her hard work every day, as this is how she helps her family get ahead. 

The borrower is requesting this loan in order to buy soft drinks for her business. She is very grateful for the opportunity she has been given and promises to make her payments in accordance with the loan schedule.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es:
El socio Omar pertenece al Banco Comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA”,el socio continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de materiales de construccion,el socio lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio vende lo que son cemento,ladrillos,piedras entre otros,a la vez es el socio es abogado de profesion siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
EL socio solicita el credito para la compra de cemento para su negocio.

El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Omar is part of the "Nueva Luz del Mañana" communal bank. He continues to make a living from the sale of construction materials. He has been working in this business for a while now and it is successful because of his hard work every day. Omar sells materials such as cement, bricks, and stones, among others. The borrower is also a lawyer by profession, and in this way he helps his family get ahead.

The borrower is requesting this credit in order to buy cement for his business. He is very grateful for the opportunity he has been given and promises to make his payment in accordance with the loan schedule.

loans.use: To buy cement for his business.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Nueva Esperanza” que conforman 10 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 39. Teodora tiene 56 años tine 03 hijos de la cual 01 de ellos en etapa escolar, son el motor y motivo de seguir adelante. Teodora se dedica desde hace 03 años en la venta de mercería. Teodora solicito el crédito para la compra de lana, hilos, agujas, crochet. El sueño de  Teodora es de terminar de  techar su casa y asi poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Teodora está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Teodora se encuentra en la parte de atrás es la segunda del lado derecho viste polo rosado y pantalón negro.
texts.en:
This is the "Nueva Esperanza" [New Hope] Group which is made up of 10 members that make a living at a variety of different businesses. This is their 39th loan. 

Teodora is 56 years old and has 3 children, one of whom is of school age; they are the driving force and reason to keep moving forward. Teodora has made a living selling haberdashery for 3 years. Teodora is applying for a loan to buy wool, thread, needles, crochet hook[s]. Teodora's dream is to finish roofing her house and so be able to give her children a better quality of life. Teodora is very happy with this loan and she thanks Kiva. 

[In the photo] you can find Teodora at the back, the second from the right, wearing a pink polo shirt and black trousers.

loans.use: to buy wool, thread, needles, crochet hook[s].

loans.name: Susan Andrea

texts.es:
Susan tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera,  una joven carismática, responsable,  amable y sobre todo amante de los niños, ella acaba de terminar sus estudios universitarios en la especialidad de Educación  inicial.
Ella ya se encuentra trabajando en una institución educativa, haciendo lo que más le gusta, enseñar a los más pequeñitos, ella desde hace un año  es auxiliar  de la profesora  de los niños de 5 años de edad en dicha institución.
El dinero que solicita es para la obtención de su título profesional, para poder ejercer su carrera como docente,  y poder desempeñarse en lo que más la apasiona, que es dedicar su tiempo a los niños.
En el futuro piensa formar su propia Institución Educativa , mejorar el nivel educativo de los niños de su localidad , y sobre todo retribuir el esfuerzo que hicieron sus padres para poder  brindarle una educación universitaria.
texts.en:
Hello! Receive friendly greetings from all Peruvians.  Susan is 25 years old and single.  She is a charismatic young woman, who is responsible, friendly, and above all, loves children.  She just finished her university degree with a major in Early Education. She is already working in a school doing what she loves most, which is teaching the smallest children.  For the past year she has been a teacher’s assistant for 5 year-olds.

The money she is requesting is so that she can obtain a professional degree in order to continue her career as a teacher and do what she is most passionate about, which is spending time with children. 

In the future, she plans to open up her own school, improve the education level of the children in her area, and above all repay the efforts that her parents made to provide her with a university education.

loans.use: to pay for her professional degree.

loans.name: Gotitas De Amor Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Gotitas de Amor” que conforman 07 mujeres emprendedoras que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 13. Mida tiene 48 años, conviviente con 03 hijos de la cual 01 de ellos en etapa escolar. Mida tiene un puesto en el mercado donde se dedica desde hace 5 años en la venta de carne de res. Mida solicito el préstamo para la compra de carne, menudencias. Su sueño es de terminar su casa y así darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. Mida está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Mida se encuentra ubicada en la parte de adelante es la tercera del lado izquierdo, viste polo verde con rayas amarillas.
texts.en: This is the "Gotitas de Amor" ("Little Drops of Love") Group made up of 7 women entrepreneurs that make a living from various commercial activities, passing to its 13th cycle. Mida is 48 years old and lives with her 3 children, one of whom is still in school. Mida has a stall at the market, where she has made a living by selling beef for the last 5 years. Mida asked for the loan to buy meat and trifles. Her dream is to finish her house and thus give her children a better quality of life. Mida is very content with this loan and thanks Kiva. Mida is located in the front, third from the left, dressed in the green polo with yellow stripes.

loans.use: to buy meat and trifles.

loans.name: Miguel Angel Diego

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal PROAVE,este banco esta situado en el distrito de San Jeronimo, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Miguel tiene 50 años de edad,01 hijo y es conviviente,el socio alterna sus activiades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como pollos,el socio cuenta con una granja donde cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que mas le solicitan,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,a la vez cuenta con otro negocio de venta de joyas hechos en plata,siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para la compra de pollos para su negocio.
El socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Miguel belongs to the communal bank PROAVE.  This bank is located in the San Jeronimo district, Cuzco province, in the department of Cuzco. He is 50 years old with has one son, and he lives with his common law wife.  He alternates between two jobs.  He has a business raising small animals such as chickens.  He has a farm where he raises these small animals so that he can sell them to his customers who are always asking him for more.  He has had this business for years and it is going well thanks to the hard work he puts in every day.  He also has another business selling silver jewelry.  This is how he helps his family get ahead.   Miguel is requesting a loan to purchase chickens for his business.  He is responsible and hardworking, as this is the way he supports his family.

loans.use: to purchase chickens for his business.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal PROAVE, este banco está situado en el distrito de San Jerónimo, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco. 
El socio Emilio tiene 25 años de edad, 01 hijo y es separado, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como pollos, él socio  cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que más le solicitan, él socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio a la vez trabaja en una empresa privada, siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de pollos para su negocio.
 El socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Emilio belongs to the “PROAVE” communal bank, located in San Jeronimo district, in the province and department of Cusco.

Emilio is 25 years old, has 1 son, and is separated from his wife. His daily activities include raising small farm animals such as chickens. He raises these small animals and later, sell them to customers who order them. Emilio has been in this business for many years and it is doing well, thanks to the effort he puts into the business each day. At the same time, Emilio works for a private enterprise, and this, too, helps his family forge ahead.

Emilio is requesting a loan to purchase more chickens for his business.

He is a responsible and  enterprising person, and this is how he advances his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens to raise for his business.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: La Sra. Claudia es una profesora de nivel primario que trabaja en  una escuela particular en la zona de Pacata Baja, ella es soltera tiene un hijo,  además Claudia se dedica a la venta de productos como carteras, blusas, abrigos para mujer  que los compra en las ferias populares al por mayor y los vende en el colegio donde trabaja a sus colegas a pagos o cuotas, donde genera un ingreso extra. La Sra. Claudia le gusta enseñar, a los niños, trabaja muy bien con ellos, y en las épocas de fin de año ha pensado en comprar mercadería para poderla vender a sus colegas quienes buscaran regalos. Esto le ayudara mucho, porque  la Sra.  Claudia comprara blusas y abrigos que los venderá a sus colegas y podrá tener mejores ingresos para mejorar su vida y la de su hijo. Posteriormente también ella quiere realizar estudios superiores de especialización en la educación.
texts.en: Claudia is a primary school teacher, working in a private school in the Pacata Baja area.  She is single and has one child.  As well as teaching, Claudia sells products such as blouses, purses and women's coats, which she buys in bulk at the popular markets.  She sells them to colleagues - either for a single payment or paid for in installments - in the school where she works.  She earns a little extra money doing this.  Claudia likes teaching children and works very well with them  At the end of last year, she was thinking of buy merchandise to sell to her colleagues looking for gifts.  This would help Claudia a lot as she could buy blouses and coats to sell to her colleagues and she could have a higher income to improve her and her son's life.  Later on, Claudia would like to do further studies to specialise within the field of education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Nely

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal PROAVE,este banco esta situado en el distrito de San Jeronimo,provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Nely tiene 31 años de edad ,02 hijos y es separada,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos naturales ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio el cual le v a bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia trabaja a pedido repartiendo sus productos a sus clientes que le solicitan, a la vez la socia trabaja en una empresa privada, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de productos naturales para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Proave communal bank, which is located in the district of San Jeronimo, which is in the province and department of Cusco.  Member Nely is 31 years old, has two children and is separated.  She has a business selling natural products and now has been dedicated to this business for several years.  It's going well, thanks to the strong effort she puts in every day.  Nely receives orders and she then provides the products to the customers who have ordered them.  At the same time, she also works in a private company and so is bringing her family forward.
The member is applying for this loan to buy natural products for her business.
Nely is grateful for the loan and promises to repay it within the agreed time frame.

loans.use: to buy natural products for her business.

loans.name: Caminando Juntos Group

texts.es:
Este es el Grupo “Caminando Juntos” que conforman 12 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al 11. Luz  tiene 27 años, conviviente con 03 hijos. Luz tiene desde hace  02 años un puesto de costura, cuenta con clientes fidelizados. Luz solicito el crédito para la compra de hilos, telas, agujas. Su sueño es de comprar una remalladora para su negocio. Luz está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Luz se encuentra ubicada  en la parte de adelante es la segunda del lado izquierdo, viste polo rosado.
* La señora Clariza se encuentra en la foto adjunta al lado derecho, viste polo amarillo.
texts.en:
This group is called  “Caminando Juntos”  (Walking Together) and is made up of 12 members who have more than 11 different commercial activities.  Luz is 27 years old.  She lives with her common law husband and has 3 children.  For the past 2 years she has worked as a seamstress.  She has loyal clients.  She is requesting a loan to purchase thread, fabric, and needles.  Her dream is to purchase an overlock sewing machine for her business.  She is very happy with this loan and thanks Kiva.  In the group photo, Luz is in the front, second from the left, dressed in a pink polo. 

Clariza is in the attached photo on the right hand side, in a yellow shirt.

loans.use: to purchase thread, fabric, and needles.

loans.name: La Union Hace La Fuerza Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “La Unión Hace la Fuerza” que conforman 07 socios emprendedores que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 01. Elsa tiene 38 años, conviviente con 03 hijos de las cuales 02 de ellos en etapa escolar y es la que preside al grupo. Desde hace 02 años Elsa tiene un restaurante donde ofrece comida a la carta, ceviche y gaseosas, cuenta con clientes fidelizados. Elsa solicito el préstamo para la compra de gaseosas, pollo y arroz. Su mayor sueño es de ampliar más su negocio y así poder atender mejor a sus clientes. Elsa está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Elsa se encuentra ubicada en la parte de atrás es la segunda del lado izquierdo, viste polo celeste.
texts.en: This is the communal bank “La Unión Hace la Fuerza," which is made up of 7 enterprising members who have a diverse set of businesses.  They are in their first loan cycle.  Elsa is 38 years old.  She lives with a partner and has 3 children, 2 of whom are school-aged.  She is the leader of the group.  For 2 years, Elsa has had a restaurant where she offers food a la carte, ceviche, and soft drinks to her loyal customers.  She is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks, chicken and rice.  Her main dream is to expand her business so that she could serve her customers better.  Elsa is very pleased to be getting this loan, and she is thankful to Kiva.  Elsa is located in the back of the photo - she is the second from the left, wearing a light blue shirt.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, chicken and rice

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONE I ,la socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de compra y venta de ropa,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia viaja cada cierto tiempo a la ciudad de Lima para comprar su mercaderia para luego entregar a sus clientes que le pidieron,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de casacas para su negocio.
texts.en: The member belongs to the Comuzone I communal bank. Eusebia continues working in the business of buying and selling clothing. She has spent many years in this business which is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day. She travels every so often to the city of Lima to buy her merchandise in order to later deliver it to her customers at their request. This is the way that she gets her family ahead. She seeks this loan to buy jackets for her business.

loans.use: to purchase jackets for her business.

loans.name: Josefina Abigail

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “COMUZONE I”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Josefina Abigail;la socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de venta de productos naturales,la socia vende su mercaderia en un local ubicado por el centro de la ciudad,la socia trabaja desde las 08:00am hasta las 06:00pm ,la socia se siente bien con su negocio ya que mediante este la socia saca adelante a su famila.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de productos naturales.


La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member belongs to the “COMUZONE I” communal bank which is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. The member in question is Josefina Abigail who makes her living selling natural products, selling her merchandise in a location found in the city center. Josefina Abigail works from 8:00am to 6:00pm, she feels content with her business as it through this means that she gets her family ahead in life. Josefina Abigail is seeking the loan to buy natural products. She is happy about the loan and promises to meet the repayments.

loans.use: to buy natural products.

loans.name: Reyna Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Reyna del Carmen” en la ciudad del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; comercialización de artesanía, ropa, comida, CD y zapatos, otros  a brindar servicios de construcción y transportes. 

Dora nació en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene 59 años de edad y tiene dos hijos. Dora se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como pollos, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pollos. Ya son 7 años que tiene el negocio y le va excelente gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends set up the “Reyna del Carmen” communal bank in the city of Cusco. This communal bank is made up of people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead in life, and with their hard work of every day, they provide their children with a better future. The member's activities are, for example: selling handicrafts, clothes, food, CDs and shoes; others provide services in construction and transport.

Dora was born in the beautiful city of Cusco and lives in the same city in which she was born, she is 59 years old and has 2 children. Dora makes her living rearing small animals such as chicken, on this occasion, she needs the loan to buy chicken. She has had this business for 7 years and it is going extremely well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

The members as a whole are grateful for the opportunity they are being given and promise to meet the repayments of their different loans within the fixed timetables. Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco of the department of Cusco, in the very heart of the ancient city of the Incas, known for being a tourist area, for its archaeological sites, its historical center, its scenery, its history and for being a delightful city in the Southern Region of the country. Cusco is known for being a very touristic and commercial area, for its traditional festival, the Inti Raymi, and for being home to one of the Seven Wonders of the World: Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to buy chicken.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
EL socio pertenece al banco comunal COMUZONE I ,el socio sigue con su negocio de venta de ropa ,el vende lo que con chompas,casacas,pantalones,polos entre otros,el socio viaja cada cierto tiempo a la ciudad Lima para traer su mercaderia para luego venderlo en su local a sus clientes que le soliciten como tambien le mandan su mercaderia desde Lima,el socio lleva años con su negocio siendo de esta forma que el socio saca adelante a su familia.

El socio solicita el credito para la compra de pantalones y chompas para su negocio.
El socio se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Comuzone I. Ruben continues with his business selling clothes. He sells sweaters, jackets, pants and polos, among other items. He travels every so often to the city of Lima to get his merchandise to later sell it in his town to his customers who request it because they also get their goods from Lima. He has spent many years in this business and this is the way he gets his family ahead. 

The member seeks the loan for the purchase of pants and sweaters for his business. He feels grateful for the previously granted loan and he promises to comply with his established payments.

loans.use: to buy pants and sweaters for his business.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece la banco comunal COMUZONE I,la socia sigue con su negocio de venta de verduras,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco,la socia se siente bien con su negocio el cual le trae satisfaciones tanto economica como personales,la socia trabaja todos los dias en su negocio siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de zapallo y tomates para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the COMUZONE I communal bank. She continues in her vegetable-selling business. She sells in one of the markets of the city of Cusco. She feels good about this business, which brings both personal and economic rewards. The member works every day in her business, which is the way that she provides for her family.

The member is requesting this loan for the purchase of squash and tomatoes for her business.

The member feels grateful for the credit, and she is committed to making her loan payments according to the established terms.

loans.use: to purchase squash and tomatoes for her business.

loans.name: Itagia

texts.en: Itagia is a 23-year-old married woman with four children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu (a root vegetable) to earn a living. Itagia has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, spade, weedkiller spray, fertilizers, etc. Itagia will spend her profits for her childerns school fees.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, spade, weedkiller spray, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Amancaes Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “AMANCAES”; Este banco se ubicado en  la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yeni  ella es conviviente, tiene 27 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando como mesera en un restaurante, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su trabajo el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, la socia trabaja seis días a la semana durante el día, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la pagar los medicamentos de su hijo ya que se encuentra un poco mal de salud.

Los otros socios  se dedican a su negocio de hospedaje, lavandería, restaurante, llamadas locales,profesionales como docentes, contador, guía de turismo, músico.

El socio que sale en la foto adjunta pidió permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el 
pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the "AMANCAES" communal bank. This bank is located in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Yeni is 27 years old, lives with her partner, and has one son. She alternates between her daily activities and working as a server in a restaurant. She has been in this job for a good amount of time and it's going well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work every day. Yeni works six days a week, during the daytime. She is a responsible and hardworking person, which is how she provides for her family. 

Yeni is requesting the loan to pay for medication for her son, since he is dealing with some health issues. 

The other members earn their livings in a lodging business, a laudromat, a restaurant, and a local-phone-call business, and in professions like teaching, accounting, guiding tourists, and music.

The member in the attached photo asked permission to arrive late to the meeting for work reasons.

Yeni appreciates those who are part of her dream through this medium, and she promises to make her loan payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to pay for her son's medication since he is dealing with some health issues.

loans.name: Kasileta

texts.en: Kasileta is a 19-year-old married woman with one child. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu (a root vegetable) to earn a living. Kasileta has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, a spade, etc for her farm. Kasileta will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her child's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, a spade, etc

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy jackets for her business.

loans.name: Mirta
